Text: Uh, wow, just like the leaked Wolverine movie, this looks like an unfinished version of the actual broadcast. I think we'll see the final, refined version Monday the usual time. But from what I've seen, IT'S PRETTY RAD!

It's a "special" episode directed/written by david o'reilly.

As he said on twitter, the quality of the leak is pretty bad but knowing his work/style, it's made to be weird (episode title is a hint).

He also said he don't really cared about piracy but he prefer that people see it in good quality to fully enjoy the cartoon.
Oh yeah, this is very real. Finally, David O'Reilly's episode, been waiting ages for this. Highly recommend if you haven't seen his stuff, look him up and enjoy the crazy!!!
